pageEntry.title: Announcements
pageEntry.description: Be in the know on the latest happenings at Bybit — new products, our latest trading pairs and more!

page_seo.title: Bybit Announcements
page_seo.description: Be the first to get the news whenever something new emerges at Bybit — Upcoming features and changes, our latest trading pairs, DeFi products and mining programs.

articleDetail.title: Special Offer: Looking for a New Crypto Card?
articleDetail.description: Looking for a New Crypto Card? If you're residing in the EU and need a new crypto card, we've got you covered!

children.text: Did you know that Bybit users in Europe have been enjoying the benefits of Bybit Card services since March 2023, and our commitment to the region is stronger than ever?

Bybit has solidified partnerships with key players in the region, such as Netherlands' SATOS, to ensure our long-term presence. If you're residing in the EU and need a new crypto card, we've got you covered!
Apply for the Bybit Card now and enjoy these exclusive rewards:
Get a 10 EUR Card Bonus upon successful virtual card application.
Receive an additional 10 EUR Card Bonus after your first successful transaction with Bybit Card.
Deposit a minimum of 100 EUR for the first time on the Bybit platform and receive a 5 USDT Fiat Bonus.
And that's not all. You can stack these benefits with our existing card features:
Cashback Rewards
: Get up to 10% cashback in points, plus enjoy additional subscription benefits. What's more, there's an extra 5% cashback for various selected categories for all users every month.
Rewards Market
: Explore a market of exclusive rewards to redeem with your earned points.
Auto-Savings
: Enjoy up to 8% APY on idle assets, while being able to spend them anytime you need to, with our Auto-Savings feature.
The best part is, you can combine these benefits with our existing perks:
Bybit Card Referral Benefit: Earn 20 USDT for each referred user, and they get 10 USDT.
First Deposit Bonus: Get a 20 USDT bonus when making your first deposit on the Bybit platform.
What's more, our Bybit Card Referral Program benefits are expanding until the end of the year:
Refer 5 qualified referees and unlock card benefits equivalent to VIP1.
Refer 20 qualified referees and unlock card benefits equivalent to VIP2.
Refer 50 qualified referees and unlock card benefits equivalent to VIP3.
Terms and Conditions:
These exclusive rewards and expanded Bybit Card Referral Program benefits are on a first-come, first-served basis, each limited to the first 10,000 users.
Bybit Card Bonus is a Fiat Bonus (EUR) exclusively for spending with the Bybit Card, credited to your Funding Account. It cannot be withdrawn or used at ATMs.
Enjoying card benefits equivalent to VIP1-VIP3 doesn't automatically grant full Bybit VIP benefits across other Bybit services. Learn more about VIP-Exclusive Bybit Card Benefits
here
and Bybit VIP
here

A qualified referee is a referee who meets Bybit Card eligibility criteria, including residency in eligible EEA countries, and successfully applies for a virtual card with the first transaction of at least 5 EUR within 14 days of application. More information can be found
here

All participating users must strictly adhere to the Bybit Terms of Service. Bybit reserves the right to disqualify any participants who engage in dishonest or abusive activities during the event, including bulk-account registrations to farm additional bonuses and any other activities in connection with unlawful, fraudulent or harmful purposes.
Bybit reserves the right to modify the terms of this event without notifying users in advance.
Bybit reserves the right of final interpretation of this event. If you have any questions, please contact our Customer Support.

**Bybit Card is issued by Moorwand Ltd (FCA Reference No 900709), a Principal member of Mastercard International Incorporated. Mastercard is a registered trademark, and any card-related inquiries can be directed to Moorwand Ltd. at Irongate House, 30 Dukes Place, London, EC3A 7LP, United Kingdom.
